home.heroSubtitle: Describe your agent's behavior in natural language. GiLo AI configures it, connects it to your tools, and deploys it in minutes.
home.terminalDesc1: A customer support agent that answers questions,
home.terminalDesc2: queries the knowledge base and escalates if needed
home.featuresSubtitle: A complete platform to design, test, and deploy AI agents connected to your tools and data.
home.featureStudioDesc: Create conversational AI agents by describing their behavior in natural language.
home.featureModelsDesc: Choose from GPT-4, Claude, Mistral and other LLMs to power your agents.
home.featureToolsDesc: Connect your agents to APIs, databases, and external services via MCP.
home.featurePlaygroundDesc: Test and iterate on your agents in real time before deploying.
home.featureDeployDesc: Deploy your agents as APIs, chat widgets, or bots with built-in monitoring.
home.featureSecurityDesc: Authentication, rate limiting, and comprehensive logging for every deployed agent.
home.howSubtitle: From idea to a deployed AI agent in minutes.
home.howStep1Desc: Describe your agent's role, tone, and capabilities in natural language.
home.howStep2Desc: Connect tools (APIs, databases, MCP) and fine-tune the system instructions.
home.howStep3Desc: Test in the playground then deploy as API, widget, or bot in one click.
home.deploySubtitle: 3 ways to integrate your AI agent once it's deployed.
home.deployMethod1Desc: Integrate your agent into any app, website, or backend via a simple REST API. Send messages and get AI responses with a single HTTP call using your API key.
home.deployMethod2Desc: Each deployed agent gets its own URL at slug.gilo.dev ‚Äî a ready-to-use conversational interface. Share the link with your users or embed it anywhere.
home.deployMethod3Desc: Generate a QR code that points to your agent's page. Perfect for restaurants, events, retail, or any physical touchpoint where users can scan and chat instantly.
home.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of creators using GiLo AI to deploy intelligent agents.

auth.signInSubtitle: Sign in to create and manage your AI agents
auth.forgotPasswordSubtitle: Enter your email and we'll send a reset link
auth.resetEmailSentDesc: If an account exists with that email, a reset link has been sent.
auth.resetPasswordSubtitle: Choose a strong password for your account
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters

quickCreate.title: Create with AI
quickCreate.subtitle: Describe your agent and AI will configure everything
quickCreate.placeholder: A customer support agent that answers questions about our product, queries the knowledge base, and escalates complex issues to a human...
quickCreate.editAfter: You can fine-tune everything in the Studio after creation
quickCreate.error: Failed to generate agent. Please try again.

example.support: A customer support agent that answers product questions, queries the knowledge base, and escalates to a human if needed
example.code: A code review assistant that detects bugs, suggests improvements, and checks security best practices
example.content: A content writer that creates blog posts, social media captions, and marketing copy in a professional tone
example.data: A data analysis assistant that helps interpret charts, calculate statistics, and generate reports

dashboard.connectPrompt: Sign in to access your agents
dashboard.manageAgents: Manage and deploy your AI agents
dashboard.noAgentsDesc: Start by creating your first AI agent with GiLo

deleteModal.title: Delete agent
deleteModal.warning: This action is irreversible. All associated data will be permanently deleted:

profile.displayNameHint: This name will be visible on the Store when you publish an agent.
profile.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
profile.exportDesc: Download a complete copy of all your personal data (GDPR Art. 15/20 ‚Äî Right of access & data portability).
profile.deleteWarning: This action is irreversible. All your data will be permanently deleted:
profile.deleteItem2: All your agents and their configurations
profile.deleteItem4: API keys, webhooks and Store listings
profile.gdprDesc: GiLo AI complies with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). You have the right to access your data (Art. 15), export it (Art. 20) and request its deletion (Art. 17).

billing.title: Subscription & Billing
billing.subscriptionActivated: Your subscription has been activated successfully!
billing.proDescription: You have access to all Pro features. Manage your subscription via the Stripe portal.
billing.freeDescription: Start for free, upgrade when you're ready. No commitment, cancel anytime.
billing.payPerAgentDesc: 1 free agent included. Add Extra or BYO LLM agents as you need.
billing.byoOwnKey: Your own API key only (OpenAI, Anthropic‚Ä¶)
billing.byoNanoMini: Your models via your API key
billing.byoDesc: Connect your own OpenAI, Anthropic, Mistral or any compatible provider API key. You pay your provider directly and keep full control.
billing.faq1a: You get 1 free agent. Extra agents cost $5.99/month each. BYO LLM agents (bring your own API key) cost $3.99/month each.
billing.faq2a: Yes, you can cancel or reduce the number of agents anytime from the management portal.
billing.faqByoA: BYO LLM (Bring Your Own LLM) lets you use your own API key. You pay your provider directly and keep full control.
billing.faq4q: What payment methods do you accept?
billing.faq4a: We accept all bank cards via Stripe (Visa, Mastercard, etc.).

chat.placeholder: Describe what you want to build...
chat.suggestTestPrompt: How can I test my agent in the Playground?
chat.quickSupportPrompt: Create a customer support agent that answers FAQs, checks a knowledge base, and escalates to humans if needed.
chat.quickAnalysePrompt: Create a data analysis agent that can read CSVs, generate reports, and answer questions about data.
chat.quickDevPrompt: Create a developer assistant agent that helps write code, debug, and explain technical concepts.
chat.quickRagPrompt: Create a RAG agent that can index documents, search a knowledge base, and answer with sources.
chat.autoGreet:
üëã **Hello!** I see your agent was just created. I'm **GiLo AI**, your copilot.

Describe **what your agent should do** and I'll configure it automatically for you:

- Its role and personality
- The right AI model
- Tools to enable
- Welcome message

For example: *"A customer support assistant for my SaaS that responds in English and French"*

agentConfig.title: Configuration

agentConfig.temperatureDesc: Low = more deterministic, High = more creative

agentConfig.byoActive: BYO LLM active ‚Äî GiLo models will be ignored

credentials.title: Credential Vault
credentials.securityDesc: All credentials are encrypted with AES-256-GCM before storage. Keys are never stored in plaintext and are only decrypted server-side when needed by your agent.
credentials.emptyDesc: Add API keys and secrets for your agent's tools

appearance.accentColorDesc: The primary color used for bubbles, buttons, and links.
appearance.backgroundImageDesc: Add a background image to your agent's chat. It will be displayed behind the conversation with an overlay.
appearance.previewHint: Changes will be visible after saving and reloading the agent chat page.

models.gpt41NanoDesc: Ultra fast, ideal for simple chat

privacy.heroSubtitle: GiLo AI applies the strictest standards for data protection, user isolation, and GDPR compliance. Every line of code is designed to protect your information.
privacy.isolationContent: Every resource (agents, projects, files, conversations, API keys, webhooks, knowledge base) is strictly siloed by user ID. No user can access another user's data.
privacy.isolationItem1: Ownership check on every protected API route
privacy.isolationItem2: Agents, projects, and deployments are filtered by JWT-derived userId
privacy.isolationItem3: The store verifies ownership before publication or deletion
privacy.isolationItem4: Sessions are tied to JWT ‚Äî impossible to spoof a userId via request body or headers
privacy.isolationItem5: MCP services and tasks require valid authentication
privacy.authContent: Authentication is based on signed JSON Web Tokens (JWT), verified on every request. No bypass mechanisms are allowed, even in development mode.
privacy.authItem2: No x-user-id bypass ‚Äî removed in both development and production
privacy.authItem3: Passwords hashed with bcrypt (12 salt rounds)
privacy.authItem4: JWT token contains no sensitive personal data (no email)
privacy.dataContent: Your data is stored in a PostgreSQL database hosted on Azure with strict access controls. Database relationships ensure cascade deletion for data integrity.
privacy.dataItem2: Cascade deletion ‚Äî deleting your account removes all associated data
privacy.dataItem3: API keys stored as SHA-256 hashes (irreversible)
privacy.encryptionContent: All communications and sensitive data are protected with enterprise-grade encryption.
privacy.encryptionItem1: TLS 1.3 for all client ‚Üî server and server ‚Üî database connections
privacy.encryptionItem3: Vector embeddings (pgvector) are stored in the same secured database
privacy.gdprContent: GiLo AI is designed to comply with the European Union's General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
privacy.gdprItem1: Article 7 ‚Äî Consent tracking with version and timestamp
privacy.gdprItem2: Article 15 ‚Äî Right of access: export all your data in one click
privacy.gdprItem3: Article 17 ‚Äî Right to erasure: complete and irreversible account deletion
privacy.gdprItem4: Article 20 ‚Äî Data portability: export in structured JSON format
privacy.gdprItem5: No personal data is sold or shared with third parties
privacy.rightsContent: Under the GDPR, you have extensive rights over your personal data that you can exercise at any time.
privacy.rightsItem1: Right of access ‚Äî View all the data we hold about you (GET /api/auth/export)
privacy.rightsItem2: Right to rectification ‚Äî Update your personal information at any time
privacy.rightsItem3: Right to portability ‚Äî Export your agents, conversations, and files as JSON
privacy.rightsItem4: Right to object ‚Äî Contact us for any specific request
privacy.deletionContent: You can permanently delete your account and all your data at any time. This action is irreversible.
privacy.deletionItem1: Cascade deletion: account, agents, conversations, messages, API keys, webhooks, knowledge files
privacy.deletionItem3: No backup copies are retained after deletion
privacy.infraContent: Our infrastructure is hosted on Microsoft Azure in the Canada Central region with enterprise-grade security measures.
privacy.infraItem1: Azure Container Apps for the backend with auto-scaling
privacy.infraItem2: Azure PostgreSQL Flexible Server with high availability
privacy.infraItem3: Azure Static Web Apps for the frontend with global CDN
privacy.infraItem4: Automated CI/CD via GitHub Actions with security checks
privacy.logsContent: Application logs are designed to never contain personally identifiable information (PII).
privacy.logsItem1: No personal data (email, password, content) in server logs
privacy.logsItem2: Error messages are sanitized ‚Äî only error.message is logged
privacy.logsItem3: API error responses never disclose implementation details
privacy.contactContent: If you have questions about the protection of your data or wish to exercise your GDPR rights, contact our team.

terms.heroSubtitle: By using GiLo AI, you agree to the following terms. Please read them carefully before using our services.
terms.acceptanceContent: By accessing or using GiLo AI, you agree to be bound by these terms of service. If you do not accept these terms, you must not use the service.
terms.acceptanceItem1: These terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and GiLo AI
terms.acceptanceItem2: You must be at least 16 years old to use this service
terms.acceptanceItem3: We reserve the right to modify these terms with 30 days' notice
terms.descriptionContent: GiLo AI is a SaaS platform for creating, configuring, testing, and deploying custom AI agents.
terms.descriptionItem1: AI agent studio with model configuration, system prompt, and tools
terms.descriptionItem2: Real-time test playground with SSE streaming
terms.descriptionItem3: Agent store to publish and share your creations
terms.descriptionItem4: Public API with access keys for external integration
terms.descriptionItem5: RAG knowledge base with vector embeddings (pgvector)
terms.accountsContent: Each user must create an account to access protected features. You are responsible for the security of your credentials.
terms.accountsItem1: One account per user ‚Äî multiple accounts are prohibited
terms.accountsItem2: You are responsible for keeping your password confidential
terms.accountsItem3: Report any unauthorized access to your account immediately
terms.accountsItem4: You can delete your account and all your data at any time (GDPR Art. 17)
terms.tiersContent: GiLo AI offers multiple service tiers with quotas adapted to each use case.
terms.tiersItem1: Free: 3 projects max, 100 MB storage, 5 deployments/month
terms.tiersItem2: Pro: 10 projects max, 5 GB storage, 20 deployments/month
terms.tiersItem3: Exceeding quotas blocks the action (no surprise charges)
terms.tiersItem4: You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time
terms.usageContent: You agree to use GiLo AI responsibly and in compliance with applicable laws.
terms.usageItem1: Use the service only for lawful and legitimate purposes
terms.usageItem2: Respect the intellectual property rights of others
terms.usageItem3: Do not overload the infrastructure with abusive requests (rate limiting enforced)
terms.usageItem4: Do not bypass security or authentication mechanisms
terms.prohibitedContent: The following activities are strictly prohibited and will result in immediate account suspension.
terms.prohibitedItem1: Creating agents that produce illegal, hateful, discriminatory, or misleading content
terms.prohibitedItem2: Using the service for spam, phishing, or social engineering
terms.prohibitedItem3: Attempting to access other users' data
terms.prohibitedItem4: Using the service for cryptocurrency mining or running malicious code
terms.prohibitedItem5: Reverse-engineering or systematic scraping of the platform
terms.ipContent: The GiLo AI platform and its source code are protected by copyright. However, you retain full ownership of your creations.
terms.ipItem1: You remain the owner of your agents, prompts, files, and configurations
terms.ipItem2: Agents published to the store are under the license you define
terms.ipItem3: GiLo AI claims no rights over content generated by your agents
terms.liabilityContent: GiLo AI provides the service 'as is' without warranty of any kind, express or implied.
terms.liabilityItem1: The service is provided without guarantee of continuous availability (best-effort SLA)
terms.liabilityItem2: GiLo AI is not responsible for content generated by AI models
terms.liabilityItem3: In no event shall liability exceed the amount paid for the service in the last 12 months
terms.terminationContent: Either party may terminate this agreement at any time, subject to the following conditions.
terms.terminationItem1: You can delete your account at any time via DELETE /api/auth/account
terms.terminationItem2: GiLo AI may suspend an account for violation of these terms
terms.terminationItem3: Upon termination, all your data is cascade-deleted within 30 days
terms.governingContent: These terms are governed by the applicable law in the following jurisdictions.
terms.governingItem1: Canadian law for general contractual matters
terms.governingItem2: EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) for personal data protection
terms.governingItem3: Any dispute shall be submitted to mediation before any legal action
terms.contactContent: If you have questions about these terms or wish to report an abuse, contact our legal team.

docs.gettingStartedSubtitle: Create your first AI agent in minutes, directly from the interface.
docs.gsStep1Desc: Click the 'Get Started' button on the homepage to create your account.
docs.gsStep1Item1: Enter your email address and choose a secure password
docs.gsStep1Item2: You're automatically logged in after signup
docs.gsStep1Item3: You're taken directly to your dashboard
docs.gsStep2Desc: From the dashboard, click 'New Agent' to start configuring.
docs.gsStep2Item1: Give your agent a name and description
docs.gsStep2Item2: Choose an AI model (GPT-4.1, Claude, etc.)
docs.gsStep2Item3: Write a system prompt that defines the agent's behavior
docs.gsStep3Desc: Use the built-in chat panel in the Studio to test your agent in real time.
docs.gsStep3Item1: Send messages and observe the responses
docs.gsStep3Item2: Adjust the configuration until you're satisfied
docs.gsStep4Desc: Once satisfied, deploy your agent and publish it to the Store.
docs.gsStep4Item1: Click 'Deploy' to put the agent online
docs.gsStep4Item2: Publish to the Store to share with the community
docs.gsStep4Item3: Generate an API key to integrate it into your applications
docs.guideDashboardDesc: The dashboard is your central hub for managing all your AI agents.
docs.dashOverviewDesc: You see the list of all your agents with their status (draft, deployed, published). Each card shows the name, description and last modified date.
docs.dashAgentsDesc: Each agent is represented by a card. Click on it to open the Studio and modify its configuration, tools or knowledge base.
docs.dashAction1: Create a new agent with the '+ New Agent' button
docs.dashAction2: Edit an existing agent by clicking its card
docs.dashAction3: Delete an agent via the card's context menu
docs.dashAction4: Access account settings and GDPR data export
docs.guideCreateTitle: Create an agent step by step
docs.guideCreateDesc: Follow these steps to create and configure your AI agent from the interface.
docs.guideCreate1Desc: From the dashboard, click the button in the top right. You're redirected to the Studio.
docs.guideCreate2Desc: Give your agent a name (e.g., 'HR Assistant'), a description, and optionally a welcome message.
docs.guideCreate3Desc: Choose the model (GPT-4.1, GPT-4.1-mini, Claude Sonnet, etc.), adjust temperature (creativity) and max tokens.
docs.guideCreate4Desc: The system prompt defines your agent's personality and skills. Be precise: role, tone, limitations, expected response format.
docs.guideCreate5Desc: Connect MCP servers to give your agent access to web search, databases, external APIs, etc.
docs.guideBuilderDesc: The Studio is the visual editor where you configure every aspect of your agent.
docs.builderConfigDesc: Left panel: AI model, system prompt, temperature, max tokens, welcome message. All settings are editable in real time.
docs.builderChatDesc: Center panel: test your agent by sending messages. Responses reflect the current configuration.
docs.builderToolsDesc: Add MCP tools (web search, code execution, etc.) that the agent can use to enrich its responses.
docs.builderPreviewDesc: Preview the final rendering of your agent as it will appear to users on the Store.
docs.builderTipDesc: Use Ctrl+S to quickly save your configuration. All changes are saved automatically.
docs.builderToolbarDesc: The Studio has a sidebar (on desktop) and a header bar (on mobile) with the following buttons:
docs.btnPlaygroundDesc: Opens the full-screen Playground to test your agent in real conditions. Send messages and observe responses with the current configuration.
docs.btnHistoryDesc: Shows the event timeline for your agent: messages sent, tool calls, configuration changes. Useful for debugging.
docs.btnConfigDesc: Opens the full agent configuration panel: AI model, system prompt, temperature, max tokens, welcome message, knowledge base and tools.
docs.btnPublishDesc: Publishes your agent to the Agent Store to share it with the community. The button turns green once the agent is published.
docs.btnApiDesc: Shows integration information: API endpoint, API key, code examples (cURL, JavaScript, Python) to integrate your agent into your applications.
docs.btnStoreDesc: Redirects to the public Store where you can browse, test and use agents published by the community.
docs.btnMcpBrowserDesc: Browse the catalogue of available MCP servers. You can explore tools, test them and add them directly to your agent.
docs.btnMcpSettingsDesc: Configure MCP servers connected to your agent: add a server (stdio or HTTP), manage environment variables and install pre-built templates.
docs.btnBackDesc: Returns to the main dashboard where you can see all your agents.
docs.guideKnowledgeDesc: Enrich your agent with your own documents. The agent can search and cite information from your base.
docs.guideKb1Desc: In the Studio, open the 'Knowledge Base' tab and drag & drop your files (PDF, TXT, Markdown, etc.).
docs.guideKb2Desc: Your documents are automatically split into sections, converted to vectors (embeddings) and stored. This process takes a few seconds.
docs.guideKb3Desc: When a user asks a question, the agent automatically searches for relevant passages in your base and incorporates them into its response.
docs.guideChatDesc: Test your agent in multiple ways before putting it into production.
docs.chatPlaygroundDesc: The built-in chat in the Studio lets you test your agent instantly. Every configuration change is reflected in real time in the responses.
docs.chatFeature3: Automatic use of configured MCP tools
docs.guideStoreDesc: The Store is the public showcase of all agents published by the community.
docs.storeBrowseDesc: Access the Store from the main menu. You can browse, search and filter agents by category. Click on an agent to see its details and chat with it.
docs.storePublishGuideDesc: To make your agent available to everyone on the Store:
docs.storePublishStep1: Open your agent in the Studio
docs.storePublishStep3: Fill in the details (category, tags, image) and confirm
docs.storeTestDesc: Each published agent has a dedicated page with a built-in chat. You can chat with any agent without creating an account.
docs.quickstartSubtitle: Create and deploy your first agent in 4 steps.
docs.step1Desc: Sign up to get a JWT authentication token.
docs.step2Desc: Configure your agent with a model, system prompt and tools.
docs.step3Desc: Send a message and receive an intelligent response.
docs.step4Desc: Add documents to the knowledge base, deploy and publish your agent to the Store.
docs.baseUrlDesc: All requests should be made to this base URL:
docs.authDesc: The API uses JWT (JSON Web Token). Get a token via /api/auth/login and include it in the Authorization header of every request.
docs.authNote: Tokens expire after 24 hours. No personal data (email) is included in the JWT.
docs.authLoginDesc: Log in and get a JWT
docs.agentsDesc: Create, configure and manage your AI agents. Each agent has its own model, system prompt and tools.
docs.knowledgeDesc: Enrich your agents with documents. Files are split into chunks, vectorized via embeddings, then used for semantic search (RAG).
docs.knowledgeNote: Embeddings are stored with pgvector. OpenAI's text-embedding-3-small model is used for vectorization.
docs.storeDesc: Browse and publish agents on the public marketplace. Published agents are accessible to everyone.
docs.apiKeysDesc: Generate API keys to let external applications access your agents without JWT authentication.
docs.webhooksDesc: Receive real-time notifications when events occur on your agents.
docs.publicApiDesc: Use the public API to integrate your agents into any application. Authenticated via API key.
docs.publicChatDesc: Chat with an agent via API key
docs.publicApiNote: ‚ö†Ô∏è The public API uses the X-API-Key header instead of JWT. Generate a key in the API Keys section.
docs.deployDesc: Deploy your agents on Azure cloud infrastructure. Each deployment creates a dedicated container.
docs.mcpDesc: Connect MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers to give your agents access to external tools, resources and prompts.
docs.rateLimitsDesc: Per-plan limits to ensure fair platform usage.
docs.rateLimitsNote: Limits are recalculated monthly. Contact us for custom needs.

apiIntegration.title: API Integration
apiIntegration.keyCopyWarning: Copy this key now. It won't be shown again.
apiIntegration.noKeys: No API keys. Create one to get started.
apiIntegration.helpText: Use these examples to integrate your agent into your applications. Each request requires a valid API key. The endpoint accepts a messages array and returns the agent's response.
apiIntegration.subdomainHelp: This link works when your domain is configured. Users can chat with your agent via this URL.
